storage

Class FileLocalStorage

  • java.lang.Object
    • storage.FileLocalStorage
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FileDAO

    public class FileLocalStorage
extends java.lang.Object
implements FileDAO
    This class provides the implementation of the methods available to load and download files to the system. Methods are specified in FileDAO class. The files must be checked as valid before being processed by this class.
    Author:
    oscar
